name: CandyUI Dark Theme for Tinyboard & Infinity
description: A simple Dark Theme for Tinyboard / vichan imageboards. If wants to add a new tinyboard imageboard support, please, comment above. Please, donate if you want to support this style developer. IF YOU WANT PASTE THIS CSS CODE DIRECTLY, REMOVE "@-moz-document..." LINE.
additional_info:
12-14-2016 23:30
New buttons, colors and others! >:^)

12-12-2016 20:40
Color scheme and others fixed.
Catalog and 8ch home are now stylized.
Added a thread spacing.


12-2-2016 15:00
A major update, where we fixed several alignment errors, improved text sizes and colors, and improved overall design. We will, from this version, improve the code as requested. Do not forget to rate, and if possible, contribute any value on Pledgie.
